October 21, 1959
Dr* Harry J* Skornia
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry;
Enclosing a copy of the annual report of the Research Committee. I
am sorry that it is so late but, after all of the discussion with
members of the committee, 1 wanted to be sure that th$y saw a copy
of it complete to be sure that I had not misinterpreted their feelings*
This is why it is on ditto* (I am assuming that headquarters makes
any further copies that are needed*) The committee seems to be
unanimous on all of the points made*
There is only one thing that bothers me a bit* Neither I, nor any
member of the committee, feels that the HcLuhan project should be
scrapped* If you feel that this in any way implies that we do think
so, I hope that you will explain this at the proper time and place -
or feel free to make any adjustments in wording which would clarify
this*
Looking forward to seeing you in Detroit* (Gads, you must be harried
nowi)
Best
Samuel L* Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio~Film
SLBlks
Enel*
